Name: STAN&CO
Review Text:
Fantastic food! Our meat was dry aged, seemed sous-vide, and grilled. It melted in mouth and cooked exactly as we asked.
The service was perfect, attentive and friendly. Finally the venue is very warm ‚Ä¶

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Very nice location with a friendly service. The interior is stylish with a cosy atmosphere. Cocktails are delicious with a good selection. Food is okay, but a bit pricy for the quality. Booking system works perfectly. The restaurant is very spacious with several tables. Good choice before going to Carre!

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text:
STAN&CO is a great place to relax and eat.
The atmosphere is great and I really liked the groovy music.
We ordered the STAN Burger and we were absolutely blown away. The burger itself ‚Ä¶

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text:

I'd recommend going for the gyoza and burger, both were absolutely incredible! ‚Ä¶

Name: STAN&CO

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Great vibe, huge variety of food from steak to ramen, nice cocktail card. Steak and gnocchi were delicious.

Name: STAN&CO

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Lovely cool new restaurant with good service that is large enough to accommodate groups. Must go if you are up to a good many a hip crowd hangout! Food is fusion inspired by different cuisines and has anything for every taste. Amazing ‚Ä¶

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Great food, drinks and service! Really enjoyed the crispy chicken sandwich and pumpkin soup. Easy to make reservations online. The colors and decor are gorgeous. Glad to find a rare gem in Amsterdam!

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Grilled fish of the day was tasty. However, the salmon in the poke bowl tasted off. The waiter politely offered to replace the dish. When I mentioned that the salmon again did not taste fresh, the waiter replied: "sorry, this is the ‚Ä¶

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Excellent food and very good price, we were expecting it to be too expensive - but it wasn't. Food was super tasty and beautiful. We took steak sandwich, gedza and duck breast salad - all were delicious and very beautiful.

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: The highlights of this place are the deco and atmosphere, it can hold big groups and is very family friendly. Food is average - everyone will find something to eat on the menu, it won‚Äôt be the best.

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Such a gem! My best experience this summer - outstanding decor, great service, amazing summer menu & drinks. I loved the atmosphere there. Coming back definitely!

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Visited Stan&Co just last week and in 1 word: amazing! The restaurant has a great design and all staffmembers were super friendly. Lots of choices and great quality of food. We will be back soon!

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: The place itself is very nice, and food and drinks are okay, but a bit overpriced for what they are. It's a nice place though to go just for a drink if you are not very picky in terms of wine!

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Very nice place. Went for drinks, but stayed to grab a bite. Great cocktails, good wine and delicious food. I like the ambiance.

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Great experience! Friendly staff and great atmosphere. Definitely coming back, either for lunch, diner, work or just reading my book! Great place for everything.

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Very nice vibe, live DJ and nice ginger teas. Staff are very friendly. Seating very spacious. Feels luxurious but not posh.

Name: STAN&CO
Review Text: Oke. ... this place is the real deal we have highly enjoyed a fabulous night out! Thanks for the service and highly enjoyed our conversation Marc. Keep up the good vibes.  Will be back soon!
